articles.title: Talks between DPRK and Mongolian FMs Held
articles.content:
Talks between DPRK and Mongolian FMs Held
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Talks between DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong on a visit to Mongolia and Mongolian Foreign Minister Lundeg Purevsuren took place on Monday.
					 Present at the talks from the DPRK side were Ri's party and the DPRK ambassador to Mongolia and from the opposite side the Mongolian ambassador to the DPRK and those concerned of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged views beneficial to developing the relations between the two countries and reached a consensus on the discussed issues.
					
					 After the talks a protocol on cooperation between the foreign ministries of the DPRK and Mongolia was signed.

articles.title: Congratulations to FM of Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Congratulations to FM of Uzbekistan
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong on Feb. 18 sent a congratulatory message to Abdulaziz Kamilov upon his reappointment as foreign minister of the Republic of Uzbekistan.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger and wished him great success in his work for developing the country's foreign relations.

articles.title: Iranian Ambassador Gives Reception
articles.content:
Iranian Ambassador Gives Reception
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Iranian Ambassador to the DPRK Mansour Chavoshi gave a reception at his embassy Tuesday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Jong Yong Su, minister of Labor who doubles as chairman  of the DPRK-Iran Friendship Association, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and other officials.
					
					 Mansour Chavoshi said that HE Kim Jong Il, who is immortal in the hearts of mankind, was the great leader who dedicated his noble life to the prosperity of the country and the people's happiness.
					
					 He expressed belief that the friendly relations between the DPRK and Iran would grow stronger.
					
					 He hoped that the Korean people would make great progress in improving the people's living standard under the wise leadership of respected HE Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop said that the Iranian friends celebrate the Day of the Shining Star together with the Korean people every year, an expression of reverence for Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Immortal feats he performed for the development of the friendly relations between the DPRK and Iran and the global cause of independence will shine long, Yang added.
					
					 The Korean people will as ever extend invariable support and solidarity to the Iranian people in their just struggle for achieving the development and prosperity of the country, he noted.

articles.title: Fishing for 2015 Begins in West Sea of Korea
articles.content:
Fishing for 2015 Begins in West Sea of Korea
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Various fishery stations in the west coastal area of the DPRK set out on fishing for this year on February 23.
					 They included the Hanchon Fishery Station under the South Phyongan Provincial Fishery Management Bureau.
					
					 When interviewed by KCNA, Ro Kwang Nam, manager of the station, said:
					
					 "My station began fishing for this year about 30 days earlier than last year, in hearty response to supreme leader Kim Jong Un's call for catching more fish.
					
					 All the fishermen are now in high spirits to carry out the station's fishing assignment for this year, twice as much as that of last year, ahead of schedule."
					
					 Meanwhile, tens of angle fishing net boats belonging to the Mundok, Kamapho, Unjon and Jongju fishery stations, too, sailed out toward fishing grounds.
					
					 Those fishery stations in the west coastal area of the country have concentrated efforts on putting their fishing boats on a modern basis and establishing a well-ordered marine commanding system.
					
					 All their employees are filled with a firm resolve to catch more fish by keeping the sea occupied all the year round.

articles.title: Actions for Protecting National Education, Korean Schools Staged in Japan
articles.content:
Actions for Protecting National Education, Korean Schools Staged in Japan
Tokyo, February 23 (KNS-KCNA) -- A meeting took place at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on Feb. 21 in demand of the application of the tuition-free program for senior high schools to Korean schools in Japan.
					 Present there were Koreans in Japan, school youth and children, personages of Japanese organizations including the representative of the Liaison Council against Exclusion of Korean Schools from Tuition-free Program for Senior High Schools and a co-representative of the Citizens Meeting for Protecting Our Schools and Children in south Korea.
					
					 The participants watched a video showing the actions for settling the issue of supporting Korean schools in the past.
					
					 At the meeting speakers said the right to education is the right all children should enjoy.
					
					 They declared they would carry on their actions till discrimination against Koreans in Japan is lifted and the issue of supporting Korean schools is settled.
					
					 An appeal was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 Meanwhile, a demonstration demanding the application of the tuition-free program for senior high schools to Korean schools was staged outside the building of the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan on Feb. 20.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Work Held
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Work Held
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- A seminar took place at the Hall of Women on Tuesday to mark the fifth anniversary of the publication of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Add Brilliance to Proud Tradition of the Juche-based Korean Women's Movement in the Drive to Build a Thriving Nation".
					 The participants heard papers proving the validity and vitality of the ideas and theories on the women's movement and the building of the women's union contained in the work published by Kim Jong Il on Feb. 24, Juche 99 (2010).
					
					 Speakers said that his work serves as an immortal great programme to be invariably held fast to in the whole course of strengthening the Juche-based Korean women's movement.
					
					 He set it as the general orientation of the women's movement and the women's union to preserve the proud tradition of the Juche-based Korean women's movement which had grown strong under the guidance of the party and the leader and add brilliance to the tradition at a new higher level as required by the building of a thriving nation, they noted.
					
					 His idea of always regarding the ideological education as the basic task is the most just idea he propounded on the basis of a scientific analysis of the mission and character of the union, intrinsic requirements of socialist society and the urgent need to build a thriving nation, they said.
					
					 They underlined the need to give full play to the stamina of the Korean women in the on-going general offensive to firmly preserve the undying ideological and theoretical feats he performed in the history of the Juche-based Korean women's movement and glorify the great Kim Jong Un's era.

articles.title: Aggressive Nature of U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Can Never Be Concealed: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Aggressive Nature of U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Can Never Be Concealed: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The U.S. authorities announced that they would unconditionally stage Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises while vociferating about "threat", "peace offensive" and the like. They peddled the trite assertions that the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises have been staged as "annual events" in a transparent and open manner for the sole purpose of "defense".
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in an article that the aggressive nature of the joint military exercises can never be concealed.
					
					 Key Resolve and Foal Eagle are not ones for "defense to cope with "threat" of someone but drills for a war to stifle the DPRK by force, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The whole course of Key Resolve and Foal Eagle is aimed to occupy the DPRK through preemptive strikes. This is evidenced by scenarios applied to Key Resolve and Foal Eagle every year.
					
					 Last year, too, the U.S. staged the largest-ever Ssangyong combined landing drill for the purpose of "occupying Pyongyang" at a time when Key Resolve and Foal Eagle reached their height.
					
					 Involved in the exercises are huge forces including the U.S. forces in south Korea and other forces in the U.S. mainland, the Pacific and Japan. The number of them is increasing systematically.
					
					 The ground, naval and air strike means involved in the exercises are bringing into bolder relief the aggressive nature of the exercises.
					
					 It is the principled stand of the DPRK that it neither feels any need to sit at a negotiating table with the U.S. nor have any willingness to deal with it now that it made clear that it would put into practice such scenarios for a war as OPLAN 5027 aimed at bringing down the social system of the DPRK.
					
					 A chance for dialogue and diplomatic solution had already been scuppered. What remains to be done is to militarily react to the U.S. while bolstering up war deterrence to the maximum.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Dismisses S. Korean Authorities' Rhetoric to Evade Blame for Catastrophe of Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Dismisses S. Korean Authorities' Rhetoric to Evade Blame for Catastrophe of Inter-Korean Relations
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are playing a poor trick to accuse the DPRK, far from feeling responsible for the north-south relations now inching close to a catastrophe. Puppet Minister of Unification Ryu Kil Jae at his retirement press conference said south Korea made "much effort for dialogue" and that "it is pity that successes have not been made as expected", creating impression that the DPRK is to blame for the failure to hold dialogue. At a "speech" made a few days later, he again pulled up the DPRK, claiming "it is not responding to the proposal for dialogue". A spokesman for the puppet Ministry of Unification also impudently urged the north to "respond to the dialogue proposal" and "show a responsible attitude".
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a commentary in this regard: This is the height of shamelessness.
					
					 It is none other than the south Korean authorities that are hell-bent on sycophancy towards the U.S. and the moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK while blatantly challenging its efforts for the improvement of the inter-Korean ties.
					
					 It is absolutely intolerable that the south Korean authorities are pulling up the DPRK even though they have blocked dialogue through the war moves for doing harm to the fellow countrymen and the racket for escalating the confrontation of the social systems. This is nothing but a poor charade to mislead the public opinion and shift the blame for the failure to open dialogue on to the DPRK, and a crafty wordplay to cover up their criminal scenario for confrontation.
					
					 If they truly hope for dialogue and the improvement of the relations between the north and the south, they should not resort to the farce for evading the responsibility for the catastrophe of the north-south relations while mocking and insulting the dialogue partner but repeal its policy for confrontation with the DPRK, though belatedly, and take practical measures for opening dialogue.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Hastening Victory of General Offensive by Dint of Science and Technology
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Hastening Victory of General Offensive by Dint of Science and Technology
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an editorial calls upon the whole party and country and all the people to turn out to hasten the victory of the general offensive by dint of science and technology.
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is the firm determination and will of the Workers' Party of Korea to rapidly develop all fields and build a people's paradise by dint of science and technology.
					
					 Scientific research at present represents acute confrontation with imperialism.
					
					 The enemies are leaving no stone unturned to put sanctions upon everything required by the DPRK as they do not want to see it live well and get rich and strong. 
					
					 With nothing, however, can they stop or delay the advance of the DPRK toward victory.
					
					 It is necessary to prevail and overtake the enemy from the front of science.
					
					 Only doing so is it possible to achieve the dignity and prosperity of the country and the nation and find a sure way of foiling the vicious moves to stifle the DPRK politically, isolate it economically and stamp out it militarily and winning victory, always taking the initiative in all confrontations with enemies.
					
					 The whole party and country and all the people should turn out as one to produce and construct everything and effect innovations by dint of science and technology and thus make all-out charge to glorify this significant year as a year of spectacular and shining victories achieved by dint of science and technology forever in the history of the country.

articles.title: Minju Joson Raps at Park Geun Hye's Reckless Remarks Fanning up Confrontation
articles.content:
Minju Joson Raps at Park Geun Hye's Reckless Remarks Fanning up Confrontation
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye, addressing a meeting of the "Preparatory Committee for Unification" at Chongwadae on Feb. 16, repeated "the doctrine of gaining a great opportunity of unification" whose true nature had been already revealed. She made desperate efforts to shift the blame for the failure to open the north-south dialogue on to the DPRK, grumbling that it is only "mentioning preconditions" and "not responding her proposals". She went the lengths of touting the strange logic that "security is guaranteed by a thick wallet, not by nuclear weapons", and let loose a string of rubbish about "trend of changes" and "reform and opening" in a bid to do harm to the line, policy and dignity of the DPRK.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a commentary in this regard: 
					
					 She chose the above-said day to invite minions to Chongwadae to let loose a string of rubbish for escalating the confrontation. This was an undisguised political provocation to the DPRK.
					
					 The climate for dialogue has been scuppered and the north-south relations are being pushed to a catastrophe due to the undisguised moves of the puppet group to escalate the confrontation with the compatriots in the north, pursuant to the U.S. policy to stifle it. 
					
					 The south Korean chief executive should draw a due lesson from the grave consequences caused by her sycophancy toward the U.S. and moves for escalating the confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 Park, far from repenting of what she has done, let loose a spate of rubbish to mislead public opinion and slander the DPRK's just stand on dialogue and inviolable social system.
					
					 Her remarks for confrontation go to prove that her ridiculous and reckless tongue-lashing is a stumbling block lying in the way of mending the inter-Korean relations and a root cause of misfortune.
					
					 It is the invariable intention of Park to persistently pursue the confrontation of the social systems, pursuant to the above-said U.S. policy.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK all out in the showdown with the U.S. will bring the most miserable doom not only to the U.S. but to the puppet forces if they seek to do harm to the fellow countrymen in the north, kowtowing to their American master.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Authorities for Trumpeting about "Dialogue"
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Authorities for Trumpeting about "Dialogue"
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Not content with floating rumor that the north-south dialogue has not taken place because the north is not "open-minded", the south Korean puppet regime has gone the lengths of making the disgusting remarks that "the north's attitude cannot be construed otherwise than its lack of will to negotiate." 
					 Minju Joson on Tuesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The dialogue between the north and the south failed to take place and a vicious cycle of confrontation has persisted due to the U.S. anachronistic hostile policy towards the DPRK and the south Korean authorities keen to escalate the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north, pursuant to the U.S. line. 
					
					 The U.S. became a laughing stock of the world due to the hacking at the Sony Pictures Entertainment but the south Korean authorities have kept mum about this.
					
					 On the contrary, the south Korean regime is intensifying its moves to escalate the confrontation with the compatriots in the north, echoing the U.S. outbursts that it is necessary to bring down the DPRK and it would hurl more aggressor forces into Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises than before.
					
					 The situation has reached such pass that the south Korean authorities are set to make a more retrogressive revision of the draconian "Security Law" by branding the south Korean people urging them to stop the moves to block the improvement of the north-south relations in pursuance of the U.S. policy, cancel the "May 24 steps" and check the scattering of anti-DPRK leaflets as "followers of the north."
					
					 Whether the north-south dialogue takes place or not and whether the north-south relations will be improved or not entirely depends on the south Korean authorities' policy switchover. 
					
					 If they are truly concerned for dialogue, they should resolutely break with the U.S., the sworn enemy of the Korean nation, roll back the confrontational policy to hurt the fellow countrymen, stop making remarks to mislead the public opinion and take practical measures to improve the inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Forcible Dissolution of Progressive Political Party Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Forcible Dissolution of Progressive Political Party Slammed
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Ex-lawmakers of the former Unified Progressive Party (UPP) and counsels of south Korea held a press conference outside the building of the Constitutional Court on Feb. 16 denouncing the authorities for their politically-motivated repressive action of disbanding the political party.
					 At the conference speakers disclosed the injustice of the decision of the court to disband the legitimate political party.
					
					 They said that the authorities deprived the lawmakers from the party of membership of the "National Assembly" while talking about their "political desire" and "ideological inclination" without any legal ground. They went on:
					
					 The decision made to dissolve the UPP, though the trial of the case of the attempted rebellion was not over, was an action of totally ignoring international practice.  
					
					 When the crisis of the regime reached its height, Park Geun Hye resorted to the politically-motivated crackdown upon the political party and posed a threat to the people.
					
					 They urged the court to rectify the serious mistake, though belatedly, and hold a retrial of the dissolution of the UPP.

articles.title: S. Korean Labor Bodies Protest Regime's Crackdown on Their Actions
articles.content:
S. Korean Labor Bodies Protest Regime's Crackdown on Their Actions
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- South Korean labor organizations, including the Confederation of Trade Unions, held a press conference in Seoul on Feb. 16 in protest against the puppet regime's crackdown on the just labor movement, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 At the press conference speakers said that a general strike is a legitimate right of the workers.
					
					 The trade unions are being pushed to the cliff because of the vicious moves of the Ministry of Employment and Labor and the Supreme Court blocking the labor movement, they said.
					
					 They demanded the authorities stop punishing the trade unions for their just strikes and abolish the unjust disciplinary measures and wrong business of the management side.

articles.title: Korean Professor in U.S. Denounces S. Korean Authorities for Kicking off Racket for "Eliminating Followers of North"
articles.content:
Korean Professor in U.S. Denounces S. Korean Authorities for Kicking off Racket for "Eliminating Followers of North"
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Sin Un Mi, a Korean professor in the U.S., in a recent phone press interview with a south Korean medium denounced the puppet group for kicking off a racket for "eliminating followers of the north", according to Jaju Minbo, an internet paper of south Korea on Feb. 10.
					 The south Korean puppet group took a tyrannical action of forcibly expelling Sin from south Korea on charges of the violation of the "Security Law" on Jan. 10 after persecuting her by labeling her "follower of the north" for the mere reason that she gave her impressions of her visit to the DPRK while giving lectures in Seoul and other areas last year.
					
					 Slamming the base smear campaign conducted by the south Korean authorities over her lectures on national reunification, she said:
					
					 I was exposed to a "witch hunt".
					
					 I can hardly understand even now why such thing happened this time though I gave similar lectures while touring all areas of south Korea over the last two years.
					
					 Media involved in the racket for "eliminating followers of the north" are not media.
					
					 It is ridiculous that my travelogue on the north was deleted from the list of excellent literary works under the pretext that it is causing a social conflict.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Serialized by German Body on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Serialized by German Body on Its Website
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "On the Juche Idea" was serialized by the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany on its website on 22 installments on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The work, published on Mar. 31, Juche 71(1982), deals with the undying historic feats President Kim Il Sung performed by founding the Juche idea and their significance, the origin of the Juche idea and its philosophical principles, socio-historical principles, guiding principles and historic significance.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Nigerian Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Nigerian Body
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article titled "The Juche idea and Kim Jong Il" on its website on Feb. 16 on the occasion of the 41st anniversary of the proclamation of the programme of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism.
					 The article said that the Juche idea recognized by the world community as an idea guiding the human cause of independence is inseparable from its founder President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, gifted thinker and theoretician, comprehensively analyzed and reviewed in his early years the history of the struggle waged by the working class in the past, the article said.
					
					 In this course he came to a conclusion that the preceding theories can not give correct answers to the theoretical and practical issues raised by the present times and that the Juche idea, a revolutionary idea of the President, only can be a guiding idea in the era of independence, the article noted.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's work "On the Juche Idea" comprehensively clarifies all issues arising in the accomplishment of the human cause of independence, the article said, and went on:
					
					 At a time when the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces were resorting to an extreme offensive to stifle the DPRK, taking an advantage of the collapse of several socialist countries in the late last century, Kim Jong Il comprehensively systematized the President's idea of attaching importance to the arms, an idea of attaching importance to the military affairs as required by the times and the developing revolution, and formulated it as the Songun idea.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people ushered in a new era of building a thriving socialist nation under the banner of the Juche idea and the Songun idea.
					
					 It is too natural to call the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, an inspiring banner for the accomplishment of the cause of independence, Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Syrian Media Praise Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Syrian Media Praise Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Syrian media dedicated special write-ups to the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Feb. 11th issue of Al Nour carried an article titled "73rd birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il" with his photo.
					
					 The article said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il gave more importance to the morrow than to the present.
					
					 In the whole course of his leadership over the country and people he always gave precedence to the future of the country with a far-sighted wisdom in working out any line and policy and handling any affairs. 
					
					 He planned all works in a big way and pushed ahead with them at the highest speed to bring earlier the future.
					
					 He didn't know standstill, impossibility and moderation.
					
					 Tishrin on Feb. 13 and Al Thawrah on Feb. 16 carried his photo and articles praising the exploits performed by him. The articles were titled "DPRK celebrates birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, challenging world imperialism and building national industry" and "DPRK celebrates birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, man of total dedication to future of prospering DPRK".
					
					 Al Baath on Feb. 14 carried an article titled "DPRK Brings Rosy Future" and a photo showing the panoramic view of Pyongyang.
					
					 The Central TV on Feb. 16 reported his undying exploits for the times and history with a portrait depicting his smiling image and photos showing his revolutionary activities.
					
					 The Central Radio Broadcasting Service aired the same report on the same day.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Celebrated Abroad
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 They included a reading session on his works "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" and "Socialism Is a Science" in Italy and round-table talks and film shows in Iran and Nigeria from Feb. 7 to 16.
					
					 Participants of the film shows watched "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation", "The Tower of the Juche Idea" and other Korean films.
					
					 The chief of the Milano Center for the Study of the Juche Idea of Italy addressed the reading session where he cited the reality in the DPRK demonstrating its invincible might to explain the validity and vitality of the Juche idea, the Songun idea.
					
					 Personages of different circles in Lagos State of Nigeria watched the films and praised Kim Jong Il for glorifying the Juche idea, the Songun idea as the guiding idea in the era of independence, building the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) into the ever-victorious party, turning the DPRK into a political, ideological and military power and consolidating the Korean People's Army into invincible combat ranks.
					
					 The Korean people are holding in high esteem Kim Jong Il as the eternal general secretary of the WPK and eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK as he laid a solid foundation for the accomplishment of the socialist cause despite any storms of history, they said.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed by Foreign Papers
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers carried special write-ups accompanied with portraits of smiling leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of his birth anniversary (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 The February issue of the Bulgarian paper Iskra carried an article titled "Life dedicated to the country". It introduced in detail his energetic activities for the prosperity of the country, happiness of its people, independent and peaceful reunification of the country and the human cause of independence.
					
					 The paper in the article titled "Socialism is a science" said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il published his work "Socialism Is a Science" when the movement for global socialism faced serous crisis.
					
					 In the work he clarified that socialism centered on man, the popular masses would surely win for its scientific accuracy and truth.
					
					 The advantages of Korean-style socialism and achievements made in the DPRK prove that socialism is a science and will be invincible.
					
					 The Ugandan paper Sun Rise on Feb. 13 devoted one whole page to an article under the headline "Life for future."
					
					 The DR Congo paper L'Avenir on Feb. 13 dedicated one whole page to articles under the titles "Unforgettable leader" and "Life for people's happiness".

articles.title: Conversaciones entre cancilleres de RPDC y Mongolia
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre cancilleres de RPDC y Mongolia
Pyongyang, 24 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 23 las conversaciones entre el canciller de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Su Yong, de visita en Mongolia y su homologo mongol, Lundeg Purevsuren.
					Estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana, la comitiva del canciller y el embajador acreditado en Mongolia y, por otra parte mongolesa, el embajador en Corea y otros  interesados de la cancilleria.
					
					En la ocasion se intercambiaron las opiniones utiles para el desarrollo de las relaciones bilaterales entre ambos paises y ambas partes  compartieron la opinion en los temas abordados.
					
					Despues de las conversaciones fue firmado el protocolo sobre la cooperacion entre las cancillerias de la RPDC y Mongolia.

articles.title: No pueden encubrir caracter agresivo de ejercicios militares conjuntos, apunta Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
No pueden encubrir caracter agresivo de ejercicios militares conjuntos, apunta Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 24 de febrero (ACNC) -- Describiendo absurdamente las exigencias justas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea como "amenaza" y "ofensiva de paz", las autoridades norteamericanas anunciaron hace poco que realizaran incondicionalmente los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle".
					Repiten su insistencia en que esas maniobras tienen el mero objetivo de "defensa" y se han librado "anualmente" hasta ahora de manera transparente y abierta.
					
					Al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun publico este martes un articulo individual aseverando que nadie podra encubrir el caracter agresivo de los ejercicios militares conjuntos Estados Unidos-Sur de Corea.
					
					"Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle" son ejercicios de guerra agresiva para atropellar por via militar a la RPDC, revela el articulo y continua:
					
					Los planes operacionales que se aplican cada ano en los ejercicios tienen el objetivo de ocupar a la RPDC mediante el ataque preventivo
					
					En el ano pasado, tuvo lugar el entrenamiento de desembarco conjunto "Ssangryong" de mayor dimension en la historia con el objetivo de "ocupar Pyongyang".
					
					Crece cada ano el numero de los efectivos participantes como las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea y las otras provenientes del territorio estadounidense, la region del Pacifico y Japon.
					
					Los medios de ataque terrestres, navales y aereos y los armamentos sofisticados, que se movilizan en los ejercicios conjuntos, ponen de relieve su caracter agresivo.
					
					Puesto que EE.UU. declaro que pondra en practica los guiones de guerra como OPLAN 5027 encaminado a derrocar el regimen de la RPDC, no hace falta conversar con ese pais.  Esto es la posicion de principios de la RPDC.
					
					Ya desaparecio la oportunidad de la solucion mediante el dialogo o por via diplomatica.  Lo unico que queda es hacerle frente al imperio con las fuerzas armadas fortaleciendo por todos los medios el disuasivo de guerra.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena locuras de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena locuras de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 24 de febrero (ACNC) -- El pasado dia 16, en la llamada reunion de los presidentes del "comite preparatorio de unificacion", Park Geun-hye expuso otra vez su anacronica doctrina de "Thong-il Taebak" (cajon de tesoros para la unificacion) y trato de imputar a la RPDC la responsabilidad de la no apertura de dialogo entre ambas partes coreanas, diciendo que el Norte "no hace nada mas que enumerar las condiciones" y "no responde a la propuesta de dialogo". Y lanzo disparates de que la "seguridad no se logra con las armas nucleares sino con la bolsa llena de dinero". Ademas, se atrevio a calumniar la linea, la politica y la dignidad de la RPDC, diciendo de "oleada de cambios" y "reforma y apertura".
					El periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 24 lo califica de provocacion politica que incita a la RPDC y  continua:
